channel.title: How To Run Your Source
channel.description:
ok heres a little tut for people who dont know how to run their source and play on their source.not to be rude or anything ok,
[b]Step1:(probally must important step.)[/b] Open Up Your Source File And Scroll Down Until You Find A Cog On Like A Pole Thingy There Should Be 2 Of Them 1 is Compiler/Compile second is Run/Run.Bat
double click the run.
Step2: Do not close the mini box when you open and click the run button otherwise your server will be offline and not working.
Step3: get a client and type in as the ip: 127.0.0.1 (for your personal server ip) or your server ip that you created using No-Ip Duc.
i hope this helps you.if your having problems with this tut reply here or pm me.
-Sharecode

item.title: How To Run Your Source
item.dc:creator: @sharecode sharecode
item.description:
@sharecode wrote:

ok heres a little tut for people who dont know how to run their source and play on their source.not to be rude or anything ok,

Step1:(probally must important step.)
Open Up Your Source File And Scroll Down Until You Find A Cog On Like A Pole Thingy There Should Be 2 Of Them
1 is
Compiler/Compile
second is
Run/Run.Bat

double click the run.

Step2:
Do not close the mini box when you open and click the run button otherwise your server will be offline and not working.

Step3:
get a client and type in as the ip:
127.0.0.1 (for your personal server ip) or
your server ip that you created using No-Ip Duc.

i hope this helps you.if your having problems with this tut reply here or pm me.

-Sharecode
